name: The Story of Maui
description:
Instructions: 

Click the game screen to begin & speak to Kanaloa on the beach.

To Interact with the world:

- Trackpad to look around

- Use the arrow keys to move & select choices

- Use the spacebar to make a choice

In order to leave the game, press the ESC key and exit browser. 

Story: 

Maui -- the demigod of Polynesia is tasked with his first mission to discover the secret of fire for mankind. Kanaloa -- the god of the sea and voyaging in Hawai'i helps Maui guide him on this quest and rewards him with his hook.
